official_title: A bill to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce all the function, powers, and duties of the Federal Communications Commission relating to the allocation of frequencies for telecommunications.

summary.text: Transfers to the Secretary of Commerce all the functions, powers, and duties of the Federal Communications Commission relating to the allocation of frequencies for telecommunications.

titles.title: A bill to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce all the function, powers, and duties of the Federal Communications Commission relating to the allocation of frequencies for telecommunications.
